wikipedia_page.main: Penelope (Penny) Horner (born 20 June 1939 in London) is a British former film and television actress.

response: The novel was adapted as an episode of the BBC anthology TV series Detective in April 1964, introduced by Rupert Davies as Maigret. It starred Michael Gwynn as Trent, Carleton Hobbs as Cupples, Bill Nagy as Bunner, Penelope Horner as Mabel Manderson, Kenneth Fortescue as Marlowe, and Peter Williams as Sigsbee Manderson.
*In the 1973 television film Bram Stoker's Dracula Mina is portrayed by Penelope Horner.
